meta.purpose: Structured knowledge base of all sources, facts, and gaps for the Intersect Mirror dashboard.

sources.name: Intersect Official Website
sources.description: Main site for Intersect MBO. Contains committee descriptions, membership info, news, and governance docs.
sources.notes: Team page returned 404 as of Feb 2026 — full staff roster unavailable.

sources.name: Intersect Knowledge Base / Docs
sources.description: Official documentation: committee mandates, election procedures, governance framework, parameter committee info.
sources.notes: Committee member lists NOT included in docs — major gap.

sources.name: Intersect X / Twitter (@IntersectMBO)
sources.description: Official X account. Announcements on hires, committee updates, events, partnerships.
sources.notes: Key source for staff hires (Feb 13, 2026 update), enterprise member announcements, office hours.

sources.name: Intersect GitHub
sources.description: Open source repos, budget proposals, committee work packages.
sources.notes: Budget committee proposals visible. Bug bounty program with TxPipe referenced.

sources.name: Cardano Foundation Blog
sources.description: CF blog post on joining Intersect (Sep 2024). Frederik Gregaard statements.

sources.name: EMURGO Blog / Posts
sources.description: EMURGO announcements. Nikhil Joshi (COO) as Intersect board member.

sources.name: IOG / IOHK Blog
sources.description: IOG updates. Gerard Moroney (COO) as Intersect board member.

sources.name: Reddit — Intersect Committee Recordings
sources.description: Committee meeting recordings shared on Reddit. OSC meetings (Feb 5, Jan 22 2026), TSC discussions.
sources.notes: Recordings exist but no official archive. Elaine identified as possible OSC Chair from meetings.

sources.name: Cardano Forum
sources.description: Community discussions on budget proposals, committee elections, governance.

sources.name: GovTool (Cardano Governance)
sources.description: On-chain governance tool for DRep delegation, voting, and governance actions.
sources.notes: Used for committee elections. No per-member vote data extracted yet — gap.

sources.name: Sam Leathers (@therealdisasm) — X
sources.description: Special Technical Advisor. Posts on tech coordination and Cardano security.

sources.name: Mike Hornan (@Hornan7) — X
sources.description: Security Incident Manager. Posts on vulnerability handling.

sources.name: Lally McClay (@LallyMcClay) — X
sources.description: Head of Ecosystem & Community. Promoted from Governance Lead.

sources.name: Intersect Testimonials Page
sources.description: Member testimonials. Source for Sricharan Ganta (Nucast), Andreas Sosilo, Yuri Kuriyama, Rafael Cardoso, Georg Link.
sources.notes: Only testimonials — not a comprehensive member list.

sources.name: Cardano Summit Recaps
sources.description: Annual summit. Adam Rusch mentioned in governance workshops.

sources.name: LinkedIn Profiles
sources.description: Professional profiles for Jack Briggs, Nikhil Joshi. Background verification.

sources.name: Cardano Blockchain Explorer (CardanoScan)
sources.description: On-chain data: treasury transactions, governance actions, DRep votes.
sources.notes: Could provide treasury flow data, governance action IDs. NOT currently integrated.

sources.name: CExplorer Governance
sources.description: Governance explorer: DRep list, governance actions, committee votes.
sources.notes: Rich governance data NOT yet integrated. Could enrich election turnout, DRep participation.

sources.name: Intersect Budget Proposals (GitHub)
sources.description: Budget committee repo with formal proposals, work packages, and committee funding requests.
sources.notes: Per-committee budget breakdowns available but NOT yet extracted into our data.

sources.name: Midnight Foundation
sources.description: Enterprise member since Dec 2025. Privacy sidechain collaboration.

sources.name: Intersect Election Archive
sources.description: Past and upcoming committee/board elections, candidate profiles, results.
sources.notes: Election results (522 voters, 27% turnout) referenced but detailed per-seat data NOT extracted.

sources.name: Cardano Constitution
sources.description: Ratified Cardano constitution defining governance guardrails, DRep roles, treasury rules.
sources.notes: Constitutional text NOT yet referenced in dashboard data.

facts.claim: Intersect administers ~300M ADA treasury (2025 budget: 263.6M ADA)
Jack Briggs appointed Executive Director Jan 2026 (from Interim)
Board has 4 Non-Executive Directors: Nikhil Joshi, Gerard Moroney, Adam Rusch, Kavinda Kariyapperuma
9 standing committees: TSC, OSC, Civics, Budget, Product, GMC, MCC, Oversight, Parameter
Committee elections are biannual; 50% of seats rotate per cycle
1,800+ paid members, 2,700+ associates
Cardano Foundation joined Intersect Sep 2024
IOG (Gerard Moroney) and EMURGO (Nikhil Joshi) are founding entities with board overlap
Midnight Foundation joined as enterprise member Dec 2025
Serviceplan Group joined as enterprise member Dec 2025
Chain Partition incident Nov 2025; TSC WG published review Jan 2026
Sam Leathers, Mike Hornan, Lally McClay roles confirmed Feb 13, 2026
Rosie Graham hired as Head of People & Culture Jan 2026
Nick Cook serves as Interim Director of Operations
OSC meetings recorded (Feb 5, Jan 22 2026); Elaine possibly chairs
Past election turnout: 522 voters, 27% participation
Oversight Committee is new for 2026 — no public reports yet
No public salary or stipend ranges disclosed for any role
Team page on intersectmbo.org returned 404
Committee member lists not published in official docs

enrichment_opportunities.action: Integrate CardanoScan/CExplorer API for treasury transactions and governance actions
Extract per-committee budget from GitHub budget-committee repo
Scrape/extract election data from GovTool and Intersect elections page
Pull DRep delegation and voting stats from CExplorer governance
Collect and link all public meeting recordings (Reddit, YouTube)
Index constitution clauses relevant to transparency/governance
Add verified professional backgrounds for all leadership
Cross-reference X followers, forum contributors for broader member data

budget.status: skeletal — needs per-committee breakdown and 2026 data

on_chain.potential: treasury flows, governance actions, DRep stats
